name: BLUE CROSS OF RHODE ISLAND et al. v. Thomas J. CALDARONE, Jr.
name_abbreviation: Blue Cross of Rhode Island v. Caldarone

judges: WEISBERGER and MURRAY, JJ., did not participate.
parties: BLUE CROSS OF RHODE ISLAND et al. v. Thomas J. CALDARONE, Jr.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is denied.
WEISBERGER and MURRAY, JJ., did not participate.

attorneys: Edwin H. Hastings, Peter J. McGinn, Steven E. Snow, Providence, for plaintiffs-respondents.
Lawrence M. Iacoi, Chief Legal Counsel, Susan D. Hayes, Legal Counsel, Dept, of Business Regulation, Providence, for defendant-petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
BLUE CROSS OF RHODE ISLAND et al. v. Thomas J. CALDARONE, Jr.
No. 80-342-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Aug. 28, 1980.
Edwin H. Hastings, Peter J. McGinn, Steven E. Snow, Providence, for plaintiffs-respondents.
Lawrence M. Iacoi, Chief Legal Counsel, Susan D. Hayes, Legal Counsel, Dept, of Business Regulation, Providence, for defendant-petitioner.
